docs.text: Welcome to the Bot Builder Community ¶ This community project is about to extend the Bot Framework platform with things like components, adapters, recognizers, dialogs and many more. The provided pieces within the Bot Builder Community repositories can be used either in Bot Framework Composer or along with the Bot Framework SDK . The Bot Builder Community is a community project initiated and owned by the following people: Arafat Tehsin Gary Pretty James Mann Stephan Bisser
